title: Thank you Rito!
body:
Thanks to the Riot, Team I got my account back when it was hacked. I fell for one of those fre Rp things and lets just say I thinK I deserved to be hacked, falling for such a thing.

I was really scared so I changed my password to everything (Google, FB, ect)! I am so grateful for your patience and understanding. I want to personally warn everyone NOT to sign in to any websites for free RP. 

I cant wait to start playing again, though I have the 20 minute penalty because of the hack but thats okay.

Once again thank you so much Rito!!!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
